hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Specialized in JavaScript architectures (React, Node.js) and PHP (Laravel). I develop complete solutions from interactive frontend to robust APIs, with special focus on accessibility.

history.title: My story
history.content: I'm Julián López Castillo, Computer Engineering student at the Universidad Nacional Experimental de Guayana (UNEG). As a person with motor disability, I have a special interest in developing accessible technologies.

environment.title: Work environment
environment.content: I develop my projects in Visual Studio Code with customized configurations for efficiency and accessibility, using extensions like ESLint, Prettier and WCAG tools. My environment is optimized for Full-Stack development productivity.

focus.title: Professional focus
focus.content: Full-Stack Developer specialized in JavaScript solutions (React, Node.js) and PHP (Laravel). I combine my technical knowledge with my unique perspective on digital accessibility.

eduneg.title: Eduneg
eduneg.description: Application for subject management with intuitive interface and responsive design.

accountModule.title: Account Movement Module
accountModule.description: Module to manage account movements in a management application with secure transactions.

skills.title: Full-stack expertise
skills.subtitle: Technologies I master in both frontend and backend

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: I'm available through these direct channels:
contact.clickMessage: Click to send a direct message
contact.whatsappMessage: Hello Julián, I saw your portfolio and would like to contact you
